title: Introducing Our Revolutionary New Feature: SmartSync
description: Conucle was established in 2022 by a team of visionary tech enthusiasts who saw the potential of the cloud to transform how businesses operate. With a combined experience of over 5 years in cloud computing, software development, and enterprise solutions, our founders embarked on a mission to create a platform that is not only robust and reliable but also user-centric and adaptable.
